description: Manage deployments in your resource group and catalog.

commands.name: az sphere deployment create
examples: az sphere deployment create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct --device-group MyDeviceGroup --images 25b91eed-1996-4049-ab9f-70982b87ad58

az sphere deployment create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct --device-group MyDeviceGroup --images 25b91eed-1996-4049-ab9f-70982b87ad58 48ecb7b3-c296-49cb-8dec-5fdaea0abb62

commands.name: az sphere deployment list
examples: az sphere deployment list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct --device-group MyDeviceGroup

commands.name: az sphere deployment show
examples: az sphere deployment show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct --device-group MyDeviceGroup --deployment-id 5422a862-cfc7-4cb8-a2d7-7ba71873b7b6
